content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <!-- edited with XMLSpy v2005 rel. 3 U (http://www.altova.com) by S.A. Cousins (University of Manchester) --> <xs:schema xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" elementFormDefault="qualified" attributeFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://copac.ac.uk/schemas/holdings/v1">  <xs:element name="localHolds">   <xs:annotation>    <xs:documentation>MODS extension for local holdings</xs:documentation>   </xs:annotation>   <xs:complexType>    <xs:sequence>     <xs:element name="org" minOccurs="0">      <xs:annotation>       <xs:documentation>Code for the holding organisation</xs:documentation>      </xs:annotation>      <xs:complexType>       <xs:simpleContent>        <xs:extension base="xs:string">         <xs:attribute name="type" use="optional">          <xs:annotation>           <xs:documentation>Suggested values include (but are not limited to):  "MARC","OCLC","RLG", "CURL"</xs:documentation>          </xs:annotation>         </xs:attribute>         <xs:attribute name="displayName" use="optional">          <xs:annotation>           <xs:documentation>Name of holding organisation</xs:documentation>          </xs:annotation>         </xs:attribute>        </xs:extension>       </xs:simpleContent>      </xs:complexType>     </xs:element>     <xs:element name="objId" minOccurs="0">      <xs:annotation>       <xs:documentation>Record ID for the object record</xs:documentation>      </xs:annotation>     </xs:element>     <xs:element name="holds" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">      <xs:annotation>       <xs:documentation>Local holdings</xs:documentation>      </xs:annotation>      <xs:complexType>       <xs:sequence>        <xs:element name="item" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">         <xs:annotation>          <xs:documentation>Item location details</xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:complexType>          <xs:sequence>           <xs:element name="loc">            <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation>Code for the branch or collection location of the item</xs:documentation>            </xs:annotation>            <xs:complexType>             <xs:simpleContent>              <xs:extension base="xs:string">               <xs:attribute name="displayName" use="optional">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Branch library/collection name</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:attribute>              </xs:extension>             </xs:simpleContent>            </xs:complexType>           </xs:element>           <xs:element name="shelfmark" minOccurs="0">            <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation>Item shelfmark or other location identification code</xs:documentation>            </xs:annotation>           </xs:element>           <xs:element name="copyNote" minOccurs="0">            <xs:annotation>             <xs:documentation>Item specific local note</xs:documentation>            </xs:annotation>           </xs:element>          </xs:sequence>          <xs:attribute name="displayLabel" use="optional">           <xs:annotation>            <xs:documentation>Dislay label for note</xs:documentation>           </xs:annotation>          </xs:attribute>          <xs:attribute name="itemNo" use="optional">           <xs:annotation>            <xs:documentation>Unique item code eg. barcode</xs:documentation>           </xs:annotation>          </xs:attribute>         </xs:complexType>        </xs:element>        <xs:element name="enumChron" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">         <xs:annotation>          <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology of holdings</xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:complexType>          <xs:simpleContent>           <xs:extension base="xs:string">            <xs:attribute name="itemNo" use="optional">             <xs:annotation>              <xs:documentation>Unique item code eg. barcode</xs:documentation>             </xs:annotation>            </xs:attribute>            <xs:attribute name="type" use="optional">             <xs:simpleType>              <xs:restriction base="xs:string">               <xs:enumeration value="bib">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for document</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>               <xs:enumeration value="sup">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for supplement</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>               <xs:enumeration value="ind">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for index</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>              </xs:restriction>             </xs:simpleType>            </xs:attribute>           </xs:extension>          </xs:simpleContent>         </xs:complexType>        </xs:element>        <xs:element name="textHold" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">         <xs:annotation>          <xs:documentation>Textual description of holdings</xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:complexType>          <xs:simpleContent>           <xs:extension base="xs:string">            <xs:attribute name="type" use="optional">             <xs:simpleType>              <xs:restriction base="xs:string">               <xs:enumeration value="bib">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for document</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>               <xs:enumeration value="sup">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for supplement</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>               <xs:enumeration value="ind">                <xs:annotation>                 <xs:documentation>Enumeration and chronology for index</xs:documentation>                </xs:annotation>               </xs:enumeration>              </xs:restriction>             </xs:simpleType>            </xs:attribute>           </xs:extension>          </xs:simpleContent>         </xs:complexType>        </xs:element>        <xs:element name="uri" minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">         <xs:annotation>          <xs:documentation>URI link to online resource</xs:documentation>         </xs:annotation>         <xs:complexType>          <xs:simpleContent>           <xs:extension base="xs:string">            <xs:attribute name="displayLabel" use="optional">             <xs:annotation>              <xs:documentation>Display label for online resource</xs:documentation>             </xs:annotation>            </xs:attribute>           </xs:extension>          </xs:simpleContent>         </xs:complexType>        </xs:element>       </xs:sequence>      </xs:complexType>     </xs:element>     <xs:element name="localNote"     minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="1">      <xs:complexType>      <xs:annotation>       <xs:documentation>General local notes</xs:documentation>      </xs:annotation>      <xs:sequence>       <xs:any       processContents="lax"       minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"/>      </xs:sequence>      </xs:complexType>     </xs:element>    </xs:sequence>   </xs:complexType>  </xs:element> </xs:schema>
